# Summary Notebooks

Miscellaneous notebooks for dataset summaries and exploratory figures.

## Notebooks
- `demultiplexing_stats.ipynb` - Summary of cell barcode demultiplexing statistics
- `QC_filtering.ipynb` - Per dataset quality control comparison for determining filtering thresholds
- `summary_stats.ipynb` - Summaries of sequencing metrics and per-cell/per-gene metrics
- `pretty_plots.ipynb` - Plotting notebook for dataset summaries
